name: If you are a robot you'll climb UP
name_original: If you are a robot you'll climb UP
description:
WASD to Move,

SPACE to jump

Mover the Camera with your mouse.

You are a robot that has fallen into this dimension, your goal is to climb to the top of the island and leave this place. Beware, water is deadly and so is falling into the spikey rocks. Can you avoid all the traps and enemies and rise above to the top?
